ing.item: Butter (look on the back side of your measuring cup)
Golden syrup. (any light syrup will do)

directions.step:
This recipe is from the Edmonds Cookery book - the cooking bible on 3 1/2 million kiwi bookshelves. I'd love to know if they were the same as the ones you remembered. Please write and tell me.
Melt butter and sugar together in a large saucepan. Cool. Mix sugar, coconut, rolled oats, and flour together. Stir into saucepan. Dissolve soda in water and mix in. Place rounded teaspoonfuls on a greased oven tray. Bake at 350 F (180 C) for 15 minutes. Makes 36. These are chewy and a vry popular cookie here.
